content: Rolling Stone Bored Ape magazine, CGC Graded 9.8.  2500 of these were made, this is a low number of 282Looking for .05BTC (or around $1K currently).  Paid $1400 for the mag then spent $125 on grading.  Taking a loss here.  Signature required for delivery - I'll include the cost of shipping/signature when purchased.Price is (slightly) negotiable.  Message me if you're interested.Update:  Will accept .035 BTC (or whatever $850 is at the time of transaction)
